Company: Oxford University Clinical Research Unit (Oucru Vietnam)
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: JOB SUMMARY In collaboration with the University of Oxford, MORU, Menzies, WEHI, and the National Malaria Control Programs (NMCPs) in Vietnam, Laos PDR, and Cambodia, OUCRU is conducting several regional projects focused on the genetic epidemiology of drug-resistant malaria parasites, asymptomatic malaria monitoring, and sero-surveillance to support local and regional malaria control and elimination efforts. The next phase of these projects will focus on capacity building—supporting NMCPs in malaria molecular testing and data analysis to advance national malaria elimination goals and ensure long-term sustainability. We are seeking a Senior Research Assistant to provide technical and data analysis training to NMCPs, ensuring the effective delivery of hands-on laboratory and analytical skills. The role will also involve performing and optimizing molecular and serology laboratory assays, analyzing project data, and contributing to research manuscripts and publications. This position will require frequent visits to malaria-endemic provinces and partner laboratories to support training. The successful candidate will work across ongoing malaria genetic projects and a pilot malaria serology study. * KEY TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES · Understand, comply with and follow research protocols and laboratory procedures · Providing technical and data analysis training sessions to local site staffs in malaria endemic provinces and international scientific partner staffs · Conduct and Optimize the new molecular, serology laboratory assays · Analyze project data and contribute to manuscript writing · Assist PIs in training junior staffs · Engage in frequent site visits to support local collaborators and field activities. · Other support tasks as required
Job Requirements: ESSENTIAL CRITERIA · MSc or PhD (preferable) in Molecular Biology, Bioinformatics, Immunology or a related field · At least 5 year-experience in NGS sequencing or serological laboratory work (both technical and analysis) · Ability to work with clinical samples · Strong data analysis skills (experience with R, or bioinformatics software is an advantage) · Excellent interpersonal skills, team working ability · Strong communication and training skills to engage with NMCP teams. · Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work independently · Willingness to travel to malaria-endemic areas for fieldwork and training activities. · Proficient English skills (IELTS 7 or equivalent) DESIRABLE CRITERIA · Experience in clinical research, working with multiple partners · Vaccination of Hepatitis B · Interest in malaria research * BENEFITS · Contracted salary ranges: : $1,549 - $1,633 gross per month · Optional insurance: In-patient and out-patient medical coverage; Personal accident insurance coverage · Two months salary for annual bonus and clothes · Annual leave 18 days/year for the first year, a maximum of 30 days · Other responsibilities and benefits are based on Viet Nam Labor Law. * HOW TO APPLY Interested candidates are invited to send curriculum vitae, application and copies of relevant certificates, either by email or by post to Oxford University Clinical Research Unit Laboratory of Clinical Science Hospital for Tropical Diseases 764 Vo Van Kiet, Ward 1, District 5, HCMC * DEADLINE FOR SUBMISSION 26 March 2025 * We thank all applicants for their interest but only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.
Industry: Y tế / Chăm sóc sức khỏe / Thẩm mỹ / Làm đẹp , Phi chính phủ / Phi lợi nhuận

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be in the top 1% retailers on Amazon US. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 400 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only Amazon‘s sporting goods market but also to enter new e-commerce markets from many regions like Canada, Europe, Japan. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS 1. Data Collection and Analysis Gather data from various sources (sales, marketing, customer behavior) and conduct detailed analyses to identify trends and insights. 2. Report Generation Create and maintain regular reports and dashboards that provide actionable insights to stakeholders. 3. Support Decision-Making Provide data-driven recommendations to support strategic and operational decisions. 4. Data Quality Ensure data integrity and accuracy by performing regular data quality checks and troubleshooting any issues. 5. Collaboration Work closely with other departments (e.g., marketing, sales, technology) to understand their data needs and deliver relevant insights. 6. Tool Utilization Utilize BI tools and software (Power BI) to create visualizations and reports.
Job Requirements: II. SKILL AND EXPERIENCE At least 3 years’ experience in Business Intelligence or relevant role; Bachelor’s degree and above in Statistics, Business, Data Analytics, and other related fields; Strong in SQL skills; Have experience in using Python is a big plus; Ability to demonstrate a high level of verbal and written to coordinate with internal stakeholders across departments; Be opened minded, think out of the box and willing to do attitude; Experience in business intelligence in E-commerce/Fintech companies is a plus; Having knowledge in Logistics, Operation or Marketing is a plus; Entrepreneurial spirit and start-up mindset. III. WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges : Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. FOR YOU TO STAY People : Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path : Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , Ngành khác

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in term of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 500 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS Merchandising Operations Management Oversee the creation, editing, and management of product listings across e-commerce platforms (Amazon, Shopify, etc.). Automate merchandising workflows to enhance efficiency and accuracy. Ensure product listings are optimized for SEO, conversion rates, and platform-specific best practices. Manage digital assets, pricing updates, and inventory synchronization. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve merchandising strategies and drive sales growth. Promotion Operations Digitalization Develop and implement automation strategies for managing digital promotions and discounts. Optimize promotional campaigns based on real-time data and performance insights. Ensure seamless execution of promotions across multiple platforms while maintaining brand consistency. Work closely with marketing, sales, and analytics teams to enhance promotional effectiveness. Leverage AI-driven tools to forecast promotional performance and customer engagement. Programmatic Advertising Automation Develop and implement strategies to automate advertising campaigns across digital platforms. Optimize programmatic advertising campaigns using data-driven insights to improve ROAS and efficiency. Work closely with data teams to leverage AI/ML models for real-time bid adjustments and audience targeting. Monitor ad performance and troubleshoot issues related to automation and optimization. Collaborate with marketing and analytics teams to integrate advertising automation into the broader digital strategy.
Job Requirements: Knowledge Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Skills Strong project management and problem-solving abilities. Proven capability to collaborate across teams and drive digital transformation initiatives. Excellent English writing skills with strong documentation capabilities. Experience Minimum of 5 years of experience in digital marketing, programmatic advertising, e-commerce operations, or promotion management. In-depth understanding of advertising platforms such as Google Ads, Amazon DSP, Meta Ads, and programmatic bidding strategies. Hands-on experience with automation tools for digital marketing, merchandising, and promotions, including API integrations, feed management, and AI-driven optimization solutions. Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Google Analytics, Tableau, and Power BI. Familiarity with SQL or Python is a plus.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Thương mại điện tử

Company: Highlands Coffee
Job Description: Summary: The FP&A Manager is responsible for establishing and managing a robust financial budgeting, planning, analysis and forecasting process for the Company. This role involves collaborating with department heads to develop and execute financial plans, budgets, and forecasts that align with the overall business strategy. The FP&A Manager will also provide valuable insights, financial analyses, and recommendations for long-term financial planning and strategic decision-making to optimize financial performance. Key Accountabilities: Financial Analysis and Forecasting: Lead the financial analysis & forecasting process to analyze all financial aspects affecting profitability & business performance, improving forecast accuracy & proposing recommendations for profit maximization and sustainability. Analyze and articulate the drivers of organizational performance through interpretation of financial results and macro-economic trends to support strategic planning and decision-making. Collaborate with department heads to gather data and develop departmental forecasts, ensuring alignment with overall financial goals. Assist in preparing comprehensive business updates and decks to facilitate strategic planning for senior leadership. Manage financial databases by organizing and analyzing diverse data sources, consolidating Profit and Loss statements by channels and formats. Lead both consolidated and segment financial monthly rolling forecasts, including P&L, balance sheet, and cash flow. Financial Planning & Budgeting: Assist the Head of FP&A in developing & maintaining the end-to-end short- and long-term planning processes for Highlands operations, driving effective monthly financial forecasting, reporting processes (including MFR’s), and long-term planning that aligns with Highlands’ business strategic objective. Implement the annual financial budgeting process to ensure alignment with corporate strategy and overall business goals. Collaborate with department heads and senior management to develop annual budgets in alignment with the company strategy goals. Manage and control Store Opex and BU G&A Budgets, defining metrics to evaluate performance against forecasts and goals. Capital Planning and Cost Controlling Assist in capital management and optimize the cash conversion cycle to align the company’s short-term and long-term financing needs with its financial strategy. Evaluate & prioritize capital investments based on potential returns and strategic alignment. Determine the optimal allocation of financial resources across different departments or projects. Implement systems to govern cost control and review departmental accrual expenses, tracking performance against plans. Collaborate with the Accounting Team to manage cash flow and balance sheet, ensuring accurate and timely financial transactions. Reporting and Performance Management Manage all financial reports, including Monthly MFR, QBR, Board Meeting materials, and corporate reporting (JFC and VTI). Analyze financial data to identify trends, risks, and opportunities for improvement. Develop and maintain financial models to support strategic decision-making and conduct scenario analyses for potential impacts of various business decisions across all functions, except Supply Chain and Commercial. Continuously enhance financial reporting and drive business review processes. Lead special projects as designed and defined by the CFO such as digital transformation, finance transformation.
Job Requirements: Job Requirements: 07+ years of experience in financial planning and analysis, budgeting, and forecasting, preferably in the retail or consumer products industry. Proven experience in a managerial role within a finance function, preferably in a corporate environment. Strong financial modeling and analytical skills. Proficient in financial analysis tools and software. Strong proficiency in financial modeling, data analysis, and business intelligence tools (e.g., Excel, SQL, Tableau, Power BI). Excellent organization skills and ability to effectively manage multiple priorities in a rapidly changing environment. Strong presentation & communication skills with the ability to effectively communicate complex financial information to non-financial stakeholders.
Industry: Kế toán / Kiểm toán , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Job Title: Senior Ess Engineer (Erp/Plm - Engineering System Support)
Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: TTI Asia Engineering Services is expanding and will grow its local Vietnam Team to support the TTI Vietnam organizational growth. TTI Asia Engineering Services delivers services and support to TTI Engineering and Manufacturing organizations via Business Digital Transformations, staff training and development. It’s a Center of Expertise in Engineering methodologies, skillsets, digital tools and systems as well as business processes. Its 3 poles are Engineering Systems, Training & Development, and Product Design Services. In line with our strategy to further develop the Engineering Systems group, the Asia PLM group is looking to fill the role of Senior Engineer, Engineering Systems – NPD Support in Vietnam . The Asia Engineering Systems Support (ESS) team has been long established in Dongguan, PRC, and has developed a reputation of offering quality daily support to Business verticals within TTI Asia. Since 2023, ESS is regularly present in Vietnam to deliver face-to-face support and training to Vietnam organizations. This position will focus on the implementation and development of ESS support to different business units in Vietnam by communication, training, coaching, daily support… to drive best practice in usage of our systems platforms. The ideal candidate will be comfortable with a system environment while understanding mechanical or electrical engineering. The position will support the various TTI organizations around Ho Chi Minh City. The base office is expected to be at the TTI SHTP office. Weekly responsibilities will likely require 2 to 3 daily trips to other TTI facilities, either in Cuchi or Dau Giay areas. Main duty: 1. Engineering Systems – PLM (20%): To leverage PRC Engineering Systems teams for project-based supporting activities in the platforms: Teamcenter, TeamWorks & Prodea, Oracle & K2 Engineering systems - Data Entry - Engineering information check and goalkeeping in the platforms - Assistant to Engineering executions in the platforms - Assistant to Engineering documentations in the platforms 2. Engineering Systems – NPD Support (80%): To leverage PRC Engineering Systems teams for general platform supports: Teamcenter, TeamWorks & Prodea, Oracle & K2 Engineering systems - User helpdesk - User pain points or requirements gathering - Usage monitoring and reporting - Performance benchmarking & platform validation tests - Best practice deployment - Assistant to business analysis - User training and communication - Platform / Data maintenance - Assistant to continues improvement

Job Description: Affiliate Strategy & Planning: Research and analyze the affiliate marketing landscape, target audience, competitor activities, and company product offerings. Develop and implement comprehensive affiliate marketing strategies and plans aligned with overall business objectives and partner resources. Establish revenue and cost targets for each partner segment (Publishers, KOLs, KOCs, Influencers, etc.). Affiliate Network Development & Management: Identify, recruit, and manage a diverse network of high-performing affiliates, publishers, KOLs, KOCs, and influencers. Cultivate strong relationships with partners and provide ongoing support and communication. Develop and maintain a database of affiliate contacts and performance data. Negotiate contracts, commission structures, and other partnership agreements. Campaign Management: Plan and execute affiliate marketing campaigns across various platforms, with a focus on TikTok and e-commerce. Manage campaign budgets, timelines, and deliverables. Track and analyze campaign performance, identify areas for optimization, and provide regular reporting. E-Merchandising: Oversee product presentation and positioning on e-commerce platforms (website, TikTok Shop, etc.). Ensure consistent branding and optimal customer shopping experience. Manage product listings, promotions, and seasonal updates. Team Management: Lead, mentor, and develop a team of affiliate marketing professionals. Set clear performance expectations, provide regular feedback, and conduct performance reviews. Foster a collaborative and results-oriented team environment. Collaboration & Communication: Collaborate closely with internal teams (e.g., E-commerce, TikTok, Brand Marketing) to align affiliate activities with overall marketing strategies. Develop and deliver training materials and resources for affiliates. Organize events, workshops, and offline activities to engage and support the affiliate network. Reporting & Analysis: Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide regular reports on campaign performance and ROI. Analyze data to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement. Develop and implement strategies to optimize campaign performance and maximize revenue generation.
Job Requirements: Must to have: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. Proven experience in affiliate marketing, influencer marketing, or network development. Strong understanding of the digital marketing landscape, particularly TikTok and e-commerce platforms. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Data-driven mindset with strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Experience in team management and leadership. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and relevant marketing tools. Nice to have: Experience working with affiliate marketing platforms and software. Knowledge of performance marketing and tracking methodologies. Familiarity with various influencer marketing platforms and tools.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Hàng gia dụng / Chăm sóc cá nhân

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Thời Trang & Mỹ Phẩm Duy Anh (Dafc)
Job Description: The CRM Supervisor will be responsible for overseeing the development and execution of the CRM strategy to foster customer loyalty, enhance customer experience, and increase retention in line with the luxury positioning of DAFC and all the brands within DAFC portfolio. This role involves leveraging customer data to create personalized communication, implementing trade promotion programs and customer engagement campaigns, and managing the loyalty program to drive high-value customer retention. Client Engagement: • Devise and implement tailored strategies for VIP clients and various membership levels to enhance their engagement and loyalty. • Maintain and nurture existing client relationships while actively reactivating sleeping clients. Data Management: • Utilize data-driven insights to segment the customer base for targeted marketing campaigns, enhancing client engagement and sales. • Conduct thorough data analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement. Client Experience Management: • Collaborate closely with brand, retail, and marketing teams to optimize every touchpoint with clients, both online and in-store. • Implement initiatives that ensure consistency and excellence in the client experience across all channels. • Develop and execute innovative client-focused programs and events. Trade Promotions & Events: • Plan and execute generic trade promotions, such as end-of-season sales, Black Friday, Tet, and more, to drive sales and engage clients. • Organize and manage trade events, including private sales and exclusive events, creating unique shopping experiences for our clients. Others: follow other requests and assignments from Line Manager based on business needs
Job Requirements: Qualification: • Bachelor’s degree Experience • Proven experience in CRM, preferably within the luxury retail sector • Customer connectedness and customer centric mindset • Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite • Good thinking about data and system integration • Problem solving skills • Communication and teamwork skills
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing

Company: Norbreeze Collective Asia
Job Description: Objective of role: The Assistant Digital Manager is responsible for planning & managing the organization's digital channels, ensuring that they are effective, efficient and aligned with the organization's overall goals and objectives. Detailed responsibilities/accountabilities People: Manage & Supervise Delegate & assign tasks to team members. Evaluate team member performance & Propose development plan for team members. Team Leading: Oversee & guide team on daily basis tasks. Guide to measure and track performance vs campaign KPIs and objectives. Planning & Managing: Develop, implement, and manage the organization's digital strategy to achieve business goals and objectives. Build and execute digital strategies through digital marketing campaigns to achieve digital marketing growth. Plan and manage digital campaigns across all digital channels of O2O. Manage social media & digital marketing budgets with constant tracking of expenditure versus ROIs. Digital Marketing Implementing: Develop and deliver the digital plans and campaigns in line with strategic goals. Drive and optimize performance on social, digital advertising, through Facebook Ads, Google Display, SEO/SEM, Zalo, Tiktok, Programmatics and EDM. Collaborate with inhouse team to create advertising visual and content for a successful campaign. Able to contribute with creative/ novel ideas and solutions to improve implementation of digital communication. Participate in communications with brand principal and ensure that guidelines and processes are applied in assigned market. Generate commercial sales and optimize marketing ROI through digital campaigns, social media management and analytics, as well as performance marketing. Supervising & Reporting: Demonstrate strong project/ campaign management skills – with digital marketing projects and campaigns executed within stipulated timeline for launch Display strong thought process and eye for details when executing a 360-integrated marketing campaign - which is seen through communication consistency/ accuracy across all touchpoints. Display strong communication skills in liaison with both external and internal stakeholders to ensure accuracy/ efficiency of execution. Build dashboard of report for deeply analysis on data to evaluate the advertising performance on each campaign and have quick action plan on each campaign to reach the goals. Conduct a set of reports as per timeline to evaluate & monitor campaign effectively Team Development: Stay up to date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to ensure that the digital team remains competitive in the digital space Supervise a team of digital specialists and ensure their performance aligns with company goals. Develop and implement training programs to help develop the skills of digital specialists.
Job Requirements: 4-5 years’ work experience in Digital Marketing role A keen sense in retail industry is an added advantage. Proficient in Microsoft office & English communication Good knowledge of Zalo Ads, EDM, Google and Facebook Ads tools Proficient in Google Analytics, Google Data Studio, Website Platform, Basic data analyst tool. Highly adaptable to change and an excellent team player with the ability to influence and negotiate. Takes initiative and ownership Excellent planning and analytical skills Ability to work in a fast-paced setting under tight deadlines

Job Description: Our Company BioTuring is an innovative bioinformatics company that develops algorithms, and software to serve scientists from hundreds of pharmaceutical companies and leading research institutions, enabling discoveries about human diseases. Role Description As a Biomedical research, you will need to: ● Identify key omics data that are needed for a particular scientific question (Immunology, Oncology and Neuroscience). ● Collect and standardize these data. ● Make insightful discoveries and structurize the data so that it also allows other scientists to make new findings. Key Responsibilities ● Put yourself at the frontier of bioinformatics & scientific research. ● Gain the opportunity to co-author research publications with leading research groups. ● Collaborate with top research groups, gaining invaluable insights and mentorship from experienced professionals in the bioinformatics field.
Job Requirements: Requirements ● Major in Biology, Biochemistry, Biomedical Sciences, Genetics, or a related field. ● Strong foundation in molecular biology, and cell biology. ● Expertise in data analysis, including experience with single-cell and multi-omics technologies, is a plus but not required (as will be trained while working in the company). ● Possess a deep passion for science. ● English fluency. ● Highly motivated, result-oriented, strong work ethic, and willingness to learn. We Offer ● Competitive salary and benefits package. ● A collaborative and supportive work environment. ● A chance to learn and grow your career in a rapidly evolving field.
Job Type: Nhân viên chính thức, Thực tập

Company: Công Ty Cp Vàng Bạc Đá Quý Phú Nhuận - Pnj
Job Description: MISSION The Head of Customer & Market Insights plays a critical role in driving data-driven decision-making across the organization. This position is responsible for: - Leading market research & customer insights to support brand marketing, enhance customer experience, and optimize product positioning. - Providing strategic insights, identify market opportunities, and support the expansion of new business verticals. This role ensures that customer and market intelligence translates into actionable business strategies, strengthening both brand marketing efforts and future business innovations. RESPONSIBILITIES 1. Market Research & Customer Insights Lead end-to-end market research projects (qualitative & quantitative) to support brand marketing strategies. Analyze consumer behavior, purchasing trends, and brand perception to enhance brand positioning. Track customer satisfaction, NPS (Net Promoter Score), and segmentation trends to refine marketing strategies. Leverage AI-driven analytics tools to generate real-time consumer insights. Provide strategic recommendations for marketing campaigns, customer engagement, and brand storytelling. 2. Business Intelligence & New Business Strategy Act as a strategic partner to New Business Heads, providing insights on market dynamics, customer demand, and competitor landscapes. Identify growth opportunities, emerging trends, and white-space markets to support new business development. Design and execute feasibility studies for new product launches or market entries. Develop data-backed go-to-market strategies, helping business units mitigate risks and optimize investments. 3. Competitive & Industry Intelligence Continuously monitor competitor movements, industry shifts, and emerging business models. Provide benchmarking reports to highlight key differentiators and market positioning gaps. Build forecasting models and predictive analytics to anticipate industry changes. 4. Cross-functional Collaboration & Data-Driven Decision Making Partner with cross-functional teams to ensure that insights are embedded into decision-making. Develop interactive dashboards & reporting systems to provide leadership teams with real-time business intelligence. Translate complex datasets into clear, actionable insights for both short-term tactical plans and long-term strategic growth. 5. Team Leadership & Innovation Lead a high-performing research & analytics team, fostering a culture of data-driven innovation. Ensure the adoption of cutting-edge research methodologies, AI-powered analytics, and digital tools. Champion a customer-first mindset within the organization.
Job Requirements: Education & Experience: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing, Business, Data Science, Economics, or a related field. Minimum of 8 years of experience in market research, customer insights, or business intelligence, at least 2 years in a similar leadership role. Experience in retail, luxury, lifestyle, or FMCG industries is highly preferred. Skills & Competencies: Strong expertise in market research methodologies, customer segmentation, and brand analytics. Proven experience in data analytics, competitive intelligence, and business forecasting. Strategic thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to connect data insights to business decisions. Strong business acumen with experience in new market entry strategies & business model evaluation. Exceptional storytelling and presentation skills to communicate insights effectively to senior stakeholders. Leadership experience in managing and developing research & analytics teams. Proficiency in Power BI, Tableau, SQL, Python, Google Analytics, and AI-driven insights platforms. Preferred Qualifications: Experience working closely with new business teams or corporate strategy units. Knowledge of AI applications in customer insights and market forecasting. Bằng việc gửi hồ sơ ứng tuyển đến PNJ, tôi xác nhận đã đọc, hiểu rõ và đồng ý với Thông báo Chính sách thu thập và xử lý dữ liệu cá nhân của PNJ. Link Thông báo: bit.ly/nghidinh13

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Sữa Vitadairy Việt Nam
Job Description: I. Trách nhiệm: 1/ Dẫn dắt và Quản lý Đội ngũ CRM: Bao gồm 1 chuyên viên CRM có kinh nghiệm và hiểu biết về Salesforce, 1 Data Engineer và 1 ML Engineer 2/ Xây dựng và triển khai các chiến lược CRM để tăng cường sự hài lòng và trung thành của khách hàng. 3/ Phát triển Chiến lược CRM: Xây dựng, tích hợp, ứng dụng các giải pháp công nghệ cải tiến vào hệ thống CRM nhằm khai thác dữ liệu khách hàng hiệu quả 4/ Tối ưu hóa Quy trình CRM: Đảm bảo các quy trình CRM được tối ưu hóa để đạt hiệu quả cao nhất. 5/ Phân tích và Báo cáo Dữ liệu Khách hàng: Sử dụng dữ liệu để phân tích hành vi khách hàng và đưa ra các quyết định chiến lược. 6/ Hợp tác với Các Bộ Phận Khác: Làm việc chặt chẽ với các bộ phận Marketing, Bán hàng và IT để đảm bảo các chiến lược CRM được thực hiện hiệu quả. 7/ Đào tạo và Phát triển Nhân viên: Đào tạo và phát triển đội ngũ CRM để nâng cao kỹ năng và hiệu suất làm việc.
Job Requirements: II. Yêu cầu: 1/ Kinh nghiệm: Ít nhất 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực CRM, với ít nhất 2 năm ở vị trí quản lý. 2/ Kiến thức về Salesforce: Hiểu biết sâu về Salesforce và các công cụ CRM khác. 3/ Kỹ năng Phân tích Dữ liệu: Kỹ năng phân tích dữ liệu mạnh mẽ để đưa ra các quyết định chiến lược. 4/ Kỹ năng Giao tiếp: Khả năng giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm tốt. 5/ Kỹ năng Lãnh đạo: Khả năng lãnh đạo và quản lý đội ngũ hiệu quả. III. Ưu tiên: 1/ Kinh nghiệm trong ngành FMCG: Hiểu biết về ngành hàng tiêu dùng nhanh. 2/ Kỹ năng Kỹ thuật: Kinh nghiệm làm việc với các công cụ và công nghệ liên quan đến CRM và dữ liệu.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Thống kê , CNTT - Phần mềm

Job Title: Chuyên Viên Chính/Chuyên Viên Cao Cấp Vận Hành Mô Hình - Trung Tâm Quản Trị Dữ Liệu
Company: Ngân Hàng Tmcp Tiên Phong (Tpbank)
Job Description: Mục đích chức danh Nhân sự vận hành mô hình sẽ tiếp nhận các yêu cầu deploy mô hình ML từ team Data Scientist từ các đơn vị nghiệp vụ trong NH; chuyển đổi code phát triển thành code vận hành, ra đầu bài với team Data Engineer/DevOps để phát triển data pipeline; lên phương án tích hợp mô hình ML vào hệ thống vận hành/ứng dụng của NH; thiết lập cơ chế theo dõi và monitor hiệu năng của các mô hình ML đang được vận hành. Mô tả công việc Đưa các mô hình ML được đánh giá là có hiệu quả trên thực tế lên môi trường vận hành theo yêu cầu của đơn vị nghiệp vụ dựa trên tài liệu yêu cầu phát triển (BRD) (chuyển đổi code phát triển thành code vận hành hệ thống; phát triển API hoặc deploy mô hình trên platform chuyên dụng như IBM Cloud Paks for Data hoặc phối hợp với các đơn vị phát triển để tích hợp trực tiếp trên hệ thống vận hành/ứng dụng tại NH); Phối hợp với team Data Scientist trong NH để lên kế hoạch thực hiện hiệu chỉnh, bảo dưỡng mô hình ML trong trường hợp hiệu năng mô hình xuống dưới ngưỡng cho phép; Nghiên cứu, thử nghiệm, từng bước áp dụng quy trình CI/CD và thực hành MLOps trong vòng đời vận hành/phát triển của các mô hình ML (Continuous Delivery for Machine Learning – CD4ML) tại NH;
Job Requirements: a. Kinh nghiệm : Kinh nghiệm 02 năm trở lên trong lĩnh vực vận hành mô hình (MLOps); b. Yêu cầu chuyên môn : - Có kinh nghiệm/thực hành ở một trong các mảng sau: + Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các nền tảng commercial thông dụng trên thị trường để phát triển/vận hành mô hình ML như IBM Cloud Pak for Data, DataRobot, Alteryx v.v. hoặc các nền tảng open source như Kubeflow, MLFlow v.v.; ưu tiên ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm thực hành trên nền tảng IBM Cloud Pak for Data; + Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ như Hadoop, Spark, Airflow, Kafka để xây dựng luồng xử lý dữ liệu (data pipeline) phục vụ vận hành mô hình ML; + Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng công cụ Containerization (như Docker), Software Orchestration (như Kubernetes); có kinh nghiệm sử dụng CI/CD tool như Jenkins, Gitlab; - Ưu tiên ứng viên có am hiểu về các thư viện thông dụng được sử dụng trong việc phát triển mô hình ML như Keras, PyTorch, Tensorflow, Scikit-learn; - Ưu tiên các ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm làm việc tại các tổ chức tài chính/ngân hàng/các công ty công nghệ; - Các kỹ năng/yêu cầu khác: + Cẩn thận, tỉ mỉ, làm việc tốt dưới áp lực; có khả năng làm việc nhóm tốt; + Có khả năng tự tìm hiểu/tự nghiên cứu tốt; Quyền lợi Thử việc 100% lương cơ bản, tổng thu nhập 15-18 tháng/năm Thưởng dự án và thưởng cuối năm cao Môi trường làm việc sáng tạo, hiện đại, quản lý theo tiến độ và hiệu quả công việc, giờ làm việc linh hoạt Đội ngũ lãnh đạo thân thiện, hòa đồng, quan tâm đến sự phát triển của các cá nhân Nhân viên được đào đạo tận tình các kĩ năng mềm và nghiệp vụ chuyên sâu Không khí vui vẻ, đồng nghiệp trẻ trung, năng động Nhiều hoạt động tập thể lý thú và ý nghĩa: bóng đá, karaoke, đi phượt, du lịch, từ thiện hàng năm Trợ cấp thai sản cho nhân viên nữ Tổ chức khám sức khỏe tổng quát định kỳ hàng năm, mua thêm gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe cho nhân viên ngoài Bảo hiểm y tế
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư , CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Atlas Copco Việt Nam
Job Description: Atlas Copco Vietnam (a Swedish air compressor company) is accelerating digital marketing and customer experience with CRM lead executive career opportunity. Mission of the role: · Ensure correct implementation and usage of CRM system as the single source of truth · Secure that CRM system is the main communication channel for customer-related matters · Actively maintain and utilize the CRM system · Be responsible for generating leads in all 4 dimensions (Inbound, Outbound, Internal and Sales) · Support and coordinate assigned activities and tasks in the organization within the scope of responsibility. Main responsibilities 1. Customer data analysis ₋ Qualify leads from Inbound activities on time and transfer the qualified leads to responsible sales engineers ₋ Analyze customer data to identify trends, insights, and opportunities for better lead generation and lead management ₋ Collect market information and conduct marketing analysis to support business needs and development. ₋ Execute Atlas Copco – Compressor Technique website content strategy including SEO, monitoring of results, implementation of web campaigns (SEA/SEM) and email campaigns, and content for social media channels. 2. System management, training and support ₋ Administer the day-to-day operations of the CRM system, ensuring it is up-to-date, accurate, and effectively utilized by all relevant teams. ₋ Plan, organize, implement & follow up the process of data cleansing to ensure the correct data are led in the CRM system (such as account, contact, etc.) ₋ Act as contact window to the global CRM support team for system enhancement. ₋ Provide training and support to team members on CRM best practices and system usage 3. Cross-business line collaboration ₋ Support the business lines in reporting, sales statistics, price management and monitoring ₋ Provide support to sales teams upon request ₋ Work with the business lines team on the Net Promotor Score (NPS) program and follow up NPS customer survey ₋ Take full responsibility and ownership of own professional development and actively participate in development activities in line with the set development plan ₋ Execute other jobs related activities assigned by direct manager. 4. Reporting ₋ Generate dashboard reports for key performance metrics ₋ Conduct other ad-hoc reports 5. Other tasks by Direct manager
Job Requirements: Required experiences Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Proven experience in CRM management, preferably in a lead or supervisory role. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and generate actionable insights. Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, Cloud 4 Customer). Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong project management and organizational skills. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be in the top 1% retailers on Amazon US. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 400 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only Amazon‘s sporting goods market but also to enter new e-commerce markets from many regions like Canada, Europe, Japan. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. POSITION OVERVIEW The Senior Business Intelligence Analyst will play a crucial role in driving data-driven decision-making across the organization. This individual will be responsible for conducting in-depth data analysis, developing sophisticated BI reports and dashboards, and providing strategic insights to support business objectives I. JOB DESCRIPTION Data Analysis and Insights: Conduct thorough analysis of data from various sources, including sales, marketing, and customer behavior, to identify trends, generate actionable insights, and support strategic initiative Reporting and Dashboards: Design, develop, and maintain comprehensive and visually appealing dashboards and reports that facilitate data-driven decision-making across departments Advanced Analytics: Utilize advanced analytical techniques, including statistical analysis and predictive modeling, to provide deeper insights into business performance Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with stakeholders from different departments (e.g., marketing, sales, technology) to understand their data needs and ensure alignment with overall business goals Data Quality and Governance: Ensure the accuracy, integrity, and consistency of data by implementing and maintaining data quality and governance standards Mentorship and Support: Provide guidance and support to junior analysts, fostering their development and enhancing the overall analytical capability of the team Tool and Technology Optimization: Stay up-to-date with the latest BI tools and technologies, and recommend and implement improvements to enhance analytical processes
Job Requirements: II. SKILL AND EXPERIENCE A bachelor‘s degree in Business, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field. Advanced degrees are a plus. A minimum of 3 years of experience in a business intelligence or data analytics role, preferably within the e-commerce sector Proficiency in BI tools (such as Power BI), along with strong SQL skills. Knowledge of programming languages like Python is the must. Familiarity with Airflow, Jenkins is a plus Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey data-driven insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges : Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. FOR YOU TO STAY People : Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path : Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Idocean Co.,Ltd
Job Description: Key Responsibilities: 1.1. Develop and Implement Digital Advertising Campaigns: Plan and run ads on digital channels (SEO, SEM, Google Ads, Facebook, Instagram, etc.). Update and optimize campaigns based on platform changes. Monitor ad performance and costs. 1.2. Create Advertising Content and Visuals: Develop and design ad content and visuals. Ensure content meets platform standards. 1.3. Manage Website and E-commerce Channels: Post products and manage promotions on e-commerce platforms. Monitor keyword ads and report performance. 1.4. Manage and Track Budget: Set and track ad budgets. Report on budget usage and effectiveness. 1.5. Other Duties: Analyze market and competitor activities. Support customers and address inquiries. Develop marketing processes and manage ad data. Prepare regular and ad-hoc reports.
Job Requirements: Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in marketing or related field. 2-3 years of experience in digital marketing. Experience with digital ad tools (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, SEO, SEM). Strong skills in campaign planning and management. Proficient in data analysis and performance reporting (preferable using basic Python to clean data, Google Data Analytics...) Content creation and design skills, or experience working with designers. Knowledge of digital marketing trends and channels. Good project management and cross-department collaboration skills. Good communication, problem-solving abilities, time management skills. Ability to work under pressure and adaptation. Benefits: Competitive salary package with annual salary reviews. Annual bonuses and other benefits. A young, dynamic work environment with numerous opportunities for advancement. Participation in exciting activities such as birthdays, festivals, team-building events, and company trips. Training, coaching, and mentoring programs. Insurance according to labor laws. Working hours: 08:00 - 12:00 and 13:00 - 17:00, Monday to Saturday (2 Saturdays off per month).

Company: Medigo Software
Job Description: We are looking for a highly experienced Senior Digital Marketing Specialist with a strong background in Performance Marketing to drive customer acquisition, conversion, and retention through paid digital channels. The ideal candidate will be data-driven, analytical, and capable of optimizing multi-channel campaigns to maximize ROI. Key Responsibilities Develop, execute, and optimize performance marketing campaigns across various channels (Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok, Programmatic, etc.). Own and manage budget allocation across channels to maximize efficiency and ROI. Analyze and interpret campaign data to optimize conversion rates, CAC, and ROAS . Conduct A/B testing on ads, creatives, landing pages, and audience segments to enhance performance. Work closely with the creative team to develop high-performing ad copies, visuals, and video content. Collaborate with the product and CRM team to ensure seamless customer journey and retention strategies. Monitor, analyze, and report on key performance metrics, identifying insights and making data-driven recommendations. Design promotional campaigns and manage promotional budgets to enhance customer conversion while optimizing costs. Utilize design skills to create compelling marketing assets that align with brand identity and drive engagement. Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies to identify new growth opportunities.
Job Requirements: 5+ years of experience in Digital Marketing, with a strong focus on Performance Marketing . Proven track record in running and scaling high-budget performance campaigns . Hands-on experience with Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok Ads, and other paid media platforms . Strong understanding of tracking, attribution, and analytics tools (Google Analytics, GTM, Appsflyer, Mixpanel, etc.). Proficiency in data analysis and performance optimization (Excel, SQL, Looker, or similar tools is a plus). Experience with growth marketing strategies, retargeting, and funnel optimization . Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, data-driven environment and make real-time campaign adjustments. Strong communication and stakeholder management skills. Experience in e-commerce, fintech, healthtech, or similar industries is a plus. Experience in managing and optimizing promotions and discount strategies to drive conversions efficiently.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Bảo Hiểm Nhân Thọ Mb Ageas
Job Description: The Business Analysts ensure that business needs are accurately captured, analyzed, and translated into actionable solutions. 1, Business Requirements and Solution Development: Utilize in-depth knowledge of life insurance, finance, and the current system functionalities to define business problems and requirements. Collaborate effectively with business users and IT teams to recommend suitable solutions. Take ownership of developing comprehensive Business Requirement Documents (BRD) and Business Solution Documents (BSD), Software requirements specifications (SRS), and User stories to ensure End-to-end business processes and detail for required applications. 2, Research and Analysis: Conduct thorough research, solution analysis, and fit-gap analysis between business requirements and current IT system functionalities. Identify and recommend practical solutions for system implementation and document the impact analysis from both business and functional perspectives. 3, Quality Assurance and Testing Support: Assist the QA team in developing detailed test plans,and test scenarios Coordinate with stakeholders to ensure successful User Acceptance Testing (UAT), including identifying issues and ensuring resolution before deployment. 4, User Training and Support: Provide on-site training for users, focusing on the fundamental components of the system. Offer ongoing support for daily operations and application usage, including troubleshooting, root-cause analysis, and addressing user queries. 5, Project and Stakeholder Management: Act as a liaison between business and technical teams, ensuring alignment of goals and priorities, and identifying opportunities and process improvements by leveraging data to drive business solutions. Participate in project planning, status reporting, and change management processes to ensure successful implementation of business initiatives.
Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Business, Economics - Finance, or equivalent. Minimum of 3 years of experience in a Business Analyst role or equivalent position Experience with Waterfall and agile software development methodologies. Experience in using Jira and Confluence for managing requirements and projects Experience in using suitable tools/languages for business modeling, and technical diagrams (Figma, Visio, BPMN,…) Experience in banking finance and life insurance is an advantage. Experience in SQL script and using data visualization techniques and tools is an advantage Experience in implementing AI-driven or data-driven solutions to enhance decision-making processes.is an advantage
Industry: Bảo hiểm , CNTT - Phần mềm , Ngân hàng

Company: Anh Văn Hội Việt Mỹ (Vus)
Job Description: Gather, validate, clean and organize to produce a standard operating and financial data set for analysis Perform new campuses forecast, new product forecast, revenue and expenses forecast for annual budgeting and monthly/quarterly P&L re-forecast. Prepare weekly and monthly operational and financial performance report with commentory on trends. Work with IT team to build such reports using Power BI (if necessary). Weekly and monthly tracking key operational and financial metrics by program, by campuses (compared with target, forecast and historical data); provide trend analysis Implement budget control into the new ERP system. Create and produce budget control reports in ERP Work closely with the accounting team to ensure accurate financial reporting.
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor degree required (Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting/Finance/Economics/Statistic) Experience: 3-4 years of business finance, auditing or other relevant experience. Experience in implementing/using ERP system (MS Dynamic 365/ SAP/Oracle) is a plus. Big4 experiences preferred Good accounting and financial analysis foundation Advanced in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint, . Having knowledge with financial modeling and techniques Good analytical and data gathering skills Good business acumen Foreign language: Fluency in English for both writing and communication is a plus. Computer skills: Fluency with Excel/SQL/Power BI and PowerPoint Presentation.
Industry: Giáo dục / Đào tạo

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Strategic Planning & Execution Lead the development and implementation of annual, quarterly, and monthly strategic plans for the digital marketing team. Rolling Forecast Management Oversee the monthly rolling forecast process, ensuring alignment with business objectives and market trends. Performance Monitoring & Steering Develop and manage performance tracking frameworks to measure the effectiveness of marketing initiatives and drive data-driven decision-making. Business Analytics & Insights Conduct in-depth data analysis to evaluate business performance, identify growth opportunities, and provide actionable insights. Cross-functional Collaboration Partner with marketing, finance, product, and leadership teams to ensure strategic alignment and optimize resource allocation. Budgeting & Resource Allocation Support budgeting processes to ensure marketing investments align with business priorities and performance targets. Market & Competitive Intelligence Analyze industry trends, competitor performance, and emerging market opportunities to inform strategic decision-making. Process Optimization Continuously refine planning and forecasting methodologies to improve operational efficiency and accuracy.
Job Requirements: Knowledge Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business, Marketing, Finance, or a related field. Strong understanding of digital marketing strategies, e-commerce performance metrics, and financial planning. Skills Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and generate actionable insights. Strong strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities. Effective communication and presentation skills, with the ability to influence stakeholders at all levels. Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Excel, SQL, Google Analytics, or BI platforms. Ability to manage multiple priorities and drive results in a fast-paced environment. Experience 4+ years of experience in e-commerce, strategic planning, or business intelligence. Proven track record in strategy, planning, or analytics roles within digital marketing, e-commerce, or related industries. Demonstrated expertise in forecasting, performance monitoring, and strategic planning processes. Experience collaborating cross-functionally with marketing, finance, and leadership teams.

Company: East Sea Energy Environment Company Limited
Job Description: 1. Understanding Customer Needs & Solution Development Work closely with the sales team to understand customer requirements Coordinate with internal and external teams (business units, end users, developers, IT) to analyze requirements and propose suitable technical solutions. 2. Solution Proposal & Customization Prepare and present technical solutions to demonstrate the value of the company's products and services. Provide pre-sales technical support and work with product development teams to customize solutions for customers. 3. Job Title: Chuyên Viên Cao Cấp Phân Tích Giải Pháp Và Kiểm Thử Giải Pháp Ngân Hàng Số
Company: Ngân Hàng Tmcp Quốc Tế Việt Nam
Job Description: Chịu trách nhiệm (i) Tham gia xây dựng lộ trình phát triển và tối ưu hóa sản phẩm công nghệ số; (ii) Tích hợp các nghiên cứu về nhu cầu người dùng, phân tích thị trường vào các yêu cầu của sản phẩm. Trách nhiệm: Tham gia xây dựng lộ trình phát triển sản phẩm công nghệ số bao gồm nghiên cứu sản phẩm, lập kế hoạch, định vị, phát triển lộ trình, phát triển yêu cầu và ra mắt sản phẩm (đối với Giám đốc/chuyên gia); Phối hợp với các Đơn vị khác tiến hành tối ưu hóa sản phẩm; Tích hợp các nghiên cứu về nhu cầu người dùng, phân tích thị trường vào các yêu cầu của sản phẩm; Thiết kế product user flow, data flow, sequence diagram; vẽ wireframe và viết tài liệu đặc tả sản phẩm; Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo phân công của cấp quản lý.
Job Requirements: Trình độ cử nhân trở lên chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Quản trị kinh doanh hoặc các chuyên ngành liên quan. Tối thiểu 7 năm (Giám đốc/Chuyên gia)/5 năm (Chuyên viên cao cấp)/3 năm (Chuyên viên chính)/1 năm (Chuyên viên) kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực xây dựng phát triển sản phẩm, lập kế hoạch, định vị, phát triển lộ trình, phát triển yêu cầu và ra mắt sản phẩm; Kinh nghiệm trong việc phát triển web/mobile, thiết kế responsive web, native mobile và phân tích, cải tiến hiệu năng của hệ thống; Kỹ năng phân tích vấn đề, data-driven, và truyền đạt thông tin tốt; Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt; Kỹ năng tiếng Anh thành thạo.
Industry: Ngân hàng , CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Công Ty Cp Vàng Bạc Đá Quý Phú Nhuận - Pnj
Job Description: Goal Management (KPIs) (50%) Guide and assist units in developing annual KPIs Research and analyze to understand the professional area of the assigned tasks/units to provide advice and solutions for improving goal management effectiveness Monitor and support units in the implementation of action plans according to KPIs and assess results Compile performance evaluations from responsible personnel of each unit, identify causes, evaluate the effectiveness of implemented solutions, and forecast the likelihood of future completion of KPIs across the units under the assigned responsibility Summarize & Analyze Reports & Periodic Activity Plans(30%) Compile and analyze the group and unit performance reports Focus on analyzing the business model and operational efficiency (business), the operating status of the group based on data, results, and quantitative indicators regarding performance and financial effectiveness of the group and its responsible units Aggregate and filter information, promptly provide alerts and assessments to help the company and units operate more efficiently Organize personnel and assign tasks to prepare meeting documents for regular sessions of the CEO & Board of Directors as well as ad-hoc meetings as required by the CEO Specialized Analysis, Participate in Projects as Requested by CEO (20%) Join working groups to execute special topics or projects as assigned by the head of the unit Supervise and drive the implementation of CEO directives related to the assigned tasks Consult/propose improvements or additions to operational processes to the department leadership
Job Requirements: • University degree in Business Administration/ Accounting/ Statistics/ Finance or related fields • Good communication skills in English, strong ability to research professional materials • At least 03 years of experience in roles such as Strategic Consultant/Strategic Partner, Finance Analyst, Equity Research, Investment Analyst, Corporate Finance, Treasury Analyst, Research Associate, Market Research... • Preference for candidates with experience in investment funds, banks, Big4, or consulting firms, large corporations with operations/strategy management or planning & goal management departments Skills: KPI development & management, data analysis, financial analysis, work plan management, report preparation and presentation, project management Presentation and communication skills, strategic thinking, open-minded thinking, adaptability to new technologies and knowledge Strategic management, goal/target management for companies, market analysis management

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Mathpresso Việt Nam
Job Description: The Senior Digital Marketing Executive at QANDA Study plays a key role in building and implementing digital marketing strategies to promote the company's products and services, aiming to increase growth and brand awareness. The job includes: Planning and Campaign Implementation: Develop overall and detailed digital marketing plans for each stage, product, or specific campaign. Implement, manage, and optimize multi-channel advertising campaigns on platforms: Facebook, Google Ads (Search, Display, YouTube), Zalo Ads, Coc Coc, TikTok, and other channels suitable for the target audience. Ensure campaigns are executed on schedule, achieve high efficiency, and adhere to the approved budget. Work closely with the Content Marketing team, Designers, and related departments to create advertising campaigns with engaging content, suitable for the target audience and consistent with the brand message. Analysis, Reporting, and Optimization: Monitor, measure, and analyze the effectiveness of marketing campaigns using data analysis tools (Google Analytics, Facebook Analytics, etc.). Evaluate campaign performance based on established KPIs (CPA, ROI, ROAS, Conversion Rate, Reach, Engagement, etc.). Prepare periodic reports and propose optimization solutions based on analysis results to improve campaign performance and optimize costs. Control and optimize advertising costs within the allocated budget, ensuring maximum efficiency. Supporting Other Marketing Activities: Support the organization of events, seminars, PR activities, and other offline marketing activities (if any). Work with partners, agencies, and marketing service providers (if any). Contribute ideas and propose new marketing strategies based on market trends and customer needs.
Job Requirements: Minimum 3 years of experience working as a Digital Marketing professional, preferably with experience in the online education field. In-depth knowledge of Digital Marketing channels and online advertising tools (Facebook Ads, YouTube Ads, Google Ads, Zalo Ads, TikTok Ads, etc.). Experience in implementing and optimizing multi-channel advertising campaigns, achieving set KPIs. Good data analysis skills, proficient in using analysis tools (Google Analytics, Facebook Analytics, etc.). Project management, teamwork, and effective independent working skills. Proactive, highly responsible in work, ensuring a thorough understanding of product/program information and completing tasks on time. Eager to learn, proactive in seeking new knowledge, willing to receive feedback, and adaptable to a dynamic and ever-changing startup environment.

Company: Công Ty Tnhh Daesang Việt Nam
Job Description: Our company is one of the fastest growing packaged food company in Vietnam. To maximize the growth and find the new opportunity, we are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Strategic Planning and Intelligence Specialist. This role will focus on finding a new business opportunity and long term growth strategies. The ideal candidate will possess strong analytical skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.This role offers a unique opportunity to shape the company's future through data-driven strategies 1. Market Analysis Conduct in-depth market research to understand consumer behavior, market demands, and potential risks Analyze the market trends, industry development to identify growth opportunities Establish the Market Database to strengthen Company's Market Intelligence Competence Analyze competitior's investments, assets and corporate activities and "connect the dots” with regard to their strategic intent, plot out potintial next moves. 2. Support Company's Strategic Planning Develop and execute long-term business strategies aligned with corporate mission, vision and goals. Participate in multiple business strategy projects that produce recommendations for addressing major strategic issues, identify major growth opportunities and develop business plans for realizing these opportunities. Create new business cases to be presented to senior management and Board. Monitor and coordinate the vast range of company data to find the possible M&A Candidates 3. Reporting and Presentation Develop, analyze and prepare comprehensive reports and presentations for senior management and Board (Vietnam / Korea) on regular or occasional basis. Provide regular updates on Market intelligence and Industrial updates [Advantages] Career Growth: Opportunities for professional development and international exposure. Supportive Environment: Work in a collaborative and dynamic team in both Vietnam and Korea Impactful Work: Play a key role in shaping the company’s growth in Vietnam
Job Requirements: [Key Qualifications] Experience: 3+ years of experience in FMCG field or Foreign Direct Investment Company. MBA is a plus Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Economics, Finance, Marketing or a related field. Technical Skills: Proficiency in MS Office(Powerpoint, Excel, Word). Familiarity with business intelligence tools is an advantage. Communication: Proficiency in English is mandatory, Korean language is an advantage [Competencies] Strategic thinking and analytical skills, with the ability to digest and synthesize large amount of data and information into executive-level reports and documents. Integrity and Reliability: Demonstrates responsibility and consistency in delivering work. Abililty to work effectively with internal Daesang teams and executives. Respect for Others: Values diversity and respects the perspectives and contributions of others. Learning Orientation: Actively seeks opportunities to learn and grow professionally. A “can-do” attituce and tolerance of ambiguity

Job Title: Warehouse Process & System Supervisor (Cu Chi Province)
Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: The Warehouse Process & System Specialist will support the Warehouse Process and System Manager in ensuring operational efficiency, system integrity, and process improvements within the warehouse. This role involves assisting in workflow optimization, process documentation, training facilitation, system management, and inventory control. The specialist will collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive efficiency, reduce errors, and support automation efforts to enhance warehouse operations. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND AUTHORITIES 1. Process Optimization - Assist in analyzing warehouse workflows and identifying areas for improvement. - Support the development and implementation of Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs). - Participate in Lean and Six Sigma process improvement initiatives. 2. Training and Process Development: - Assist in developing and conducting training programs for warehouse staff. - Help document warehouse processes and implement error-proofing controls. - Conduct training audits to ensure effectiveness and adherence to established procedures. 3. System Management: - Support the administration of the Warehouse Management System (WMS) and related applications. - Assist in system configuration, updates, and troubleshooting. - Provide user training and technical support for warehouse staff. 4. Inventory Control: - Monitor inventory accuracy through cycle counts and reconciliation activities. 5. Safety and Compliance: - Ensure adherence to warehouse safety protocols and compliance requirements. - Assist in safety training and compliance audits. - Support initiatives to minimize accidents and improve workplace safety. 6. Data Analysis and Reporting: - Help track key performance indicators (KPIs) related to warehouse operations. - Assist in preparing reports on process efficiency, system performance, and operational issues. - Utilize data analytics to identify trends and suggest process enhancements. 7. Collaboration and Communication: - Work closely with warehouse staff, IT, logistics, and other departments to ensure smooth operations. - Facilitate communication between teams to resolve operational issues efficiently. - Participate in meetings and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.
Job Requirements: REQUIREMENTS Education Bachelor's Degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field. Experience Minimum of 2 years in warehouse operations, system management, or process improvement. Knowledge 1. Understanding of warehouse operations, inventory management, and logistics. 2. Familiarity with safety regulations and warehouse compliance standards. 3. Knowledge of Lean, Six Sigma, or other process improvement methodologies (preferred). 4. Awareness of warehouse automation tools and technologies. Functional Skills 1. Proficiency in Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and ERP software. 2. Ability to analyze data using Excel, Power BI, or similar tools. 3. Problem-solving and troubleshooting skills to support system and process improvements. 4. Strong attention to detail and analytical mindset. 5. At least intermediate level of English proficiency - speaking & understanding. Other Abilities 1. Effective communication and collaboration abilities 2. Adaptability and a continuous improvement mindset. 3. Strong organizational and time management skills.
Industry: Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Vận chuyển / Giao nhận / Kho vận , Điện / Điện tử / Điện lạnh / Điện công nghiệp

Company: Tập Đoàn Karofi Holding
Job Description: Mục tiêu công việc: Lãnh đạo và hướng dẫn đội ngũ kỹ sư AI trong việc phát triển các giải pháp AI tiên tiến, nhằm cải thiện và mở rộng khả năng của các ứng dụng xử lý giọng nói, trợ lý ảo và quản lý dữ liệu lớn Datalake. Mô tả công việc: Xây dựng và thực hiện chiến lược phát triển AI và Big Data của bộ phận. Quản lý và hướng dẫn đội ngũ kỹ sư AI trong việc thiết kế và triển khai các mô hình học máy và học sâu. Đảm bảo tích hợp dữ liệu Datalake một cách hiệu quả và an toàn. Làm việc chặt chẽ với các bộ phận khác để định hình yêu cầu sản phẩm và đảm bảo các giải pháp AI đáp ứng được mục tiêu kinh doanh. Đánh giá và quản lý rủi ro trong quá trình phát triển sản phẩm. Tạo điều kiện cho việc học tập và phát triển kỹ năng của đội ngũ. Các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của Giám Đốc. Quyền lợi Mức lương cạnh tranh, thỏa thuận theo năng lực; Thử việc hưởng 100% lương; Thời gian làm việc linh hoạt từ T2-T6; Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động, tài năng; Mức lương cạnh tranh, Review tăng lương 2 lần/năm; Thưởng ngày Lễ/Tết, thưởng KPI, thưởng dự án theo tháng; Ăn chơi du lịch theo tháng + các hoạt động team building; Có cơ hội được đào tạo phát triển và thăng tiến. Địa chỉ làm việc: 9A Thanh Liệt - Thanh Trì - Hà Nội
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên, ưu tiên các ngành Công nghệ Thông tin, Khoa học Máy tính hoặc các lĩnh vực liên quan. Kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực AI, đặc biệt là xử lý giọng nói và trợ lý ảo. Hiểu biết sâu rộng về lưu trữ, xử lý và mining dữ liệu lớn trên các nền tảng và dịch vụ đám mây phổ biến như AWS, GCP, Azure Kinh nghiệm quản lý dự án và lãnh đạo đội ngũ kỹ sư. Khả năng giao tiếp và thuyết trình tốt. Có các chứng chỉ chuyên môn liên quan đến AI và Big Data là một lợi thế. Khả năng phân tích dữ liệu và tư duy chiến lược.
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: Overview: The Warehouse Process and System Manager is responsible for overseeing the operational efficiency and system integrity of warehouse processes and monitoring the quality performance of the organization. This role involves optimizing workflow, documenting processes, leading and facilitating and evaluating training, ensuring compliance with safety and quality standards, and implementing effective inventory management systems which may involve the use of technology with the aim of automating the process resulting in significant reduction of inefficiencies in the warehouse. The Warehouse Process and System Manager will collaborate with internal and external partners in streamlining upstream and downstream processes that will enhance productivity, reduce costs and errors, and maintain a high level of service to internal and external customers. This role involves looking at usage of technology in Key Responsibilities: 1/ Process Optimization: Analyze current warehouse processes and workflows to identify areas for improvement. Develop and implement standardized operating procedures (SOPs) to enhance efficiency and productivity. Utilize Lean and Six Sigma methodologies to drive process improvement initiatives 2/Training and process development: Develop a training plan, delivering training to the warehouse organization, evaluating the training and conducting audit to assess effectivity of the training provided. Document all processes in the warehouse and implement controls to error-proof the warehousing processes. 3/System Management: Oversee the Warehouse Management System (WMS) and other related software applications. Ensure the accurate configuration and maintenance of the WMS, including updates and system integrations. Train staff on system usage and best practices to maximize efficiency. 4/Inventory Control: Develop and enforce inventory control procedures to maintain accurate stock levels. Monitor inventory accuracy through cycle counts and audits, addressing discrepancies promptly. 5.Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and develop warehouse staff, fostering a culture of safety, accountability, and continuous improvement. Conduct performance evaluations and provide ongoing feedback to team members. Coordinate training programs to enhance employee skills and knowledge. 6.Safety and Compliance: Ensure compliance with OSHA and other relevant safety regulations. Develop and implement safety protocols to minimize accidents and injuries in the warehouse. Conduct regular safety audits and training sessions. 7.Data Analysis and Reporting: Utilize data analytics to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) related to warehouse operations. Prepare and present reports to senior management on operational performance, process improvements, and system issues. Identify trends and recommend actions based on data analysis. 8.Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with other departments, such as logistics, sales, and customer service, to ensure seamless operations. Facilitate effective communication between warehouse staff and management. Address any operational issues promptly and efficiently.
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, Logistics, or any engineering field. A Master’s degree is a plus. Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in warehouse management or logistics Proven experience in process improvement and system implementation and warehouse automation. Technical Skills: Proficiency in Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions. Familiarity with inventory management principles and best practices Familiarity with available technology and automation products for use in the warehousing process Familiarity with Six sigma is a plus Soft Skills: Excellent leadership and team management abilities. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Problem-solving mindset with a focus on continuous improvement. Work Environment: The Warehouse Process and System Manager typically works in a warehouse setting, with exposure to various weather conditions and noise levels. The role may require extended hours during peak seasons or special projects and movement between warehouses of different locations. *Working Location: D2 Street, Tan Phu Trung Industrial Park, Cu Chi, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. We are providing shuttle bus from HCM, Binh Duong and Dong Nai
